sections.description: Forge Fields - Compose. Code. Create. is a developer-first plugin for defining dynamic fields and content in WordPress using PHP classes and a composition-based approach.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin ZIP file.
2. Upload the folder to `/wp-content/plugins/` or install via the WordPress Plugin Installer.
3. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' screen in WordPress.
